headline: Kroger Stock Is Cheap As It Dips In Post-Earnings Period
summary: Value investing in The Kroger Co. remains strong, despite mixed Q3 results, with shares up 8.2% since September and 201% since 2017. Read why KR stock is a Buy.

headline: Kroger narrows FY24 outlook as Q3 total sales drop slightly
summary: Net earnings attributable to Kroger Specialty Pharmacy declined to $618m in the third quarter.

headline: Celebrate the Holidays with Murray's Cheese from Kroger
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE:KR) is sharing a curated guide from Murray's Cheese for creative gift-giving and entertaining this holiday season. From crowd-pleasing party platters to unique flavors and cheeses for favorite holiday recipes, customers can choose from a wide selection inside Kroger Family of Stores across the country.

headline: Kroger Announces Extension of Exchange Offers and Consent Solicitations for Albertsons Companies, Inc. Notes
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) (the "Company" or "Kroger") announced today that it has extended the expiration date of the previously announced offers to exchange (the "Exchange Offers") any and all outstanding notes (the "ACI Notes") of Albertsons Companies, Inc. headline: The Friday Checkout: Is Kroger looking past its deal with Albertsons?
summary: Kroger’s CEO told investors this week that it doesn’t need to merge with its rival to grow. Could that mean the company thinks the deal won’t go through?
